challenges: Balancing the desire for money, power, and recognition with their idealism
Managing conflicting beliefs about wealth and success

guidelines: Act with quiet power and confidence.
Find something in which you can excel and persevere.
Recognize your value, and let your light shine.
questions: Do I strive for or avoid money and power?
Do I feel I have to do more to deserve success?
Do I assert myself in a balanced, consistent way?
How have my high standards helped my work and how have they held me back?

advice: Ease up on self-imposed pressure and perfectionism
Practice moderation in diet and lifestyle
Find an enjoyable and balanced form of exercise
negative: Self-sabotage through illness, divorce, or injury
Chronic tension in solar plexus and neck

opportunities: Achieving financial success and using it for good
Becoming influential and using their platform to help others
Overcoming self-doubt and achieving recognition for their work
Finding fulfilling work that aligns with their values

advice: Tune into their authentic feelings and needs
Practice flexibility and acceptance in relationships
Shift from performance to intimacy in sexual relationships
negative: Focusing on pleasing others rather than expressing their own needs
positive: Capable of deep and meaningful connections
Driven to create harmonious and balanced relationships

advice: Find work that feels meaningful and fulfilling
Value their work and charge accordingly
Don't be afraid to seek recognition and high income
negative: Struggle to find work that meets their high standards
May undervalue their work and avoid charging what they're worth
Can be late bloomers in their careers due to self-doubt
positive: Driven to succeed and achieve financial stability
Can become leaders and positive influences in their workplaces
